categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Shon was a Human male who worked as an Imperial tech specialist for the Sith Empire during the Galactic War.

When the Imperials were able take over the Green Jedi Enclave and establish a garrison in the structure during the battle on Corellia, the Republic employed stealth troopers in an attempt to drive out the Imperials. Shon determined that the Republic was utilizing an incredibly advanced cloaking technology, but managed to modify a stealth field generator to disrupt other fields. He tasked an Imperial team to trip the stealth troopers' advantages.
